word:
While Submitting to the 
                                 Holy Spirit 


     Everyone who has a realizing sense of what it means to be a Christian, will purify himself from everything that weakens and defiles. All the habits of his life will be brought into harmony with the requirements of the word of truth, and he will not only believe, but will work out his own salvation with fear and trembling, while submitting to the molding of the Holy Spirit.-- R. & H., March 6, 1888. 

                                               -
